content:
The chunk provides an overview of a programming package that implements Finite State Machines (FSMs), highlighting their abstract nature, state transitions, and utility in logic programming tasks, while directing users to additional documentation for deeper understanding.

"""
This package contains implementations of a Finite State Machine, an
abstract construct that holds a particular state and can transition
between several defined states.  These are useful for a range of logic
programming tasks.

For more information on FSMs, consult the :ref:`finite-state-machines` section
of the programming manual.
"""
